title: EoX Information - Core
description: The schema for representing End-of-Life (EoL), End-of-Security-Support (EoSSec) and other End-of information in OpenEoX.

eox_timestamp_t.title: EoX Timestamp
eox_timestamp_t.description: Contains the timestamp at which the product reaches the specified stage or the indicator that this is still 'to be announced'.

$schema.title: OpenEoX Core Schema
$schema.description: Specifies the schema the JSON object must be valid against.

end_of_life.title: End-of-Life
end_of_life.description: Indicates the last day when the particular product is officially supported in any way by the vendor.

end_of_sales.title: End-of-Sales
end_of_sales.description: Indicates the last day when a particular product may be ordered by customers from vendor sales channels.

end_of_security_support.title: End-of-Security-Support
end_of_security_support.description: Indicates the last day when the vendor has committed to providing security remediations for the particular product.

last_updated.title: Timestamp of last change
last_updated.description: Contains the RFC 3339 timestamp when the record was last updated.
